name: Pietro Iurato
subtitle: Europe, Middle East & Africa HRD Head -  Creating memorable experiences for employees - Talks about #hr, #people, #futureofwork, #leadership, and #diversityandinclusion
about: I am experienced in full HR management cycle across different functions and business areas to ensure integrated approach and processes implementation throughout organization following companies' strategies and vision.I am passionate about future of work. As a HR leader my role is to embark my team to create the most unique & memorable Employee Experience and enable our employees & leaders to run at their best, while designing the future in HR.From a company perspective,  with a global network of customers, partners, employees, and thought leaders, SAP helps the world run better and improve people’s lives. SAP is market leader in enterprise application software and helps companies and organizations of all sizes and industries run their businesses profitably, adapt continuously, and grow sustainably. Today, SAP has more than 230 million cloud users, more than 100 solutions covering all business functions, and the largest cloud portfolio of any provider.Looking for your next dream job? Discover our careers & job opportunities on the official SAP career website: https://www.sap.com/france/about/careers.html.If you would like to get more information on SAP and our HR strategy and solutions, feel free to connect with me!
experiences: HRD Head EMEA (Europe, Middle East & Africa)
Head of Human Resources EMEA South (South Europe, Middle East and Africa)
Israel, Turkey, Greece, Italy, Spain, Portugal, North West Africa
